Description:
It's here! The remote GitHub MCP server is now generally available, connecting the full suite of GitHub tools to your favorite LLMs. This release brings integrations for the Copilot coding agent, secret scanning, code scanning alerts, security advisories, and much more. Install it from the official repository today!
